H0.text: What was the previous occupation of comedian Jim Bowen. Played Professional Football

H1.text: What was the previous occupation of comedian Jim Bowen. Worked as a Police Officer

H2.text: What was the previous occupation of comedian Jim Bowen. Managed a Pub

H3.text: What was the previous occupation of comedian Jim Bowen. Taught

A4.text: In early adulthood, Bowen was a teacher and took part in local dramatic groups.

A5.text: He studied at Chester Diocesan Training College, eventually becoming a deputy headmaster at St. Paul's primary school in Caton, near Lancaster.
